Html:
Hello.

I'm working on an application using PhpExcel that is supposed to read an Excel file (as a template), fill it and save it in my server.
My problem is that the Excel template contains a macro linked to a button, and when I generate my new file using PhpExcel, i can't avoid to lose the macro and the button.

I've already read that PHPExcel previous version were not able to handle that. Is there any improvements in that point with this version ? Is there another way to solve that issue ?

Thank you in advance.
